website_summaries.verdict: This entrance mat earns high marks for an impressive array of size and color options, slip-resistant rubber backing, and innovative design that traps dirt and moisture to prevent tracking.
pros: Available in 13 size options and eight different colors
The versatility of the Andersen WaterHog allows users to find a product customized to their needs
Raised mat design traps water and dirt at the bottom of the mat so it does not get picked up by the next person to step on the mat
Grooves are reinforced with rubber to avoid wear
Rubber grip backing keeps the mat in place during use
cons: Trapped dirt can be difficult to clean from the mat due to the deep grooves

customer_reviews.title: Waterhog mat
customer_reviews.text: Great mat. Very glad I purchased it, as it adds a lot of nice entry space where we can comfortably remove and set our boots. Looks nice too! I got these mats for winter, but now I think I'll leave them out year 'round!
customer_reviews.author: santa brought a yo-yo

customer_reviews.title: Stunning High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised! This is a HIGH QUALITY mat. The fabric on the top is a course 1/4-inch thick dense carpet. The rubber is a flexible 1/8-inch thick rubber. And the bottom has little rubber beads all over to keep it in place on tile or carpet. Straight out of the box after being rolled up it set flat and ready to use. It was a great price for a high quality product. The color is STUNNING and impressive.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Size not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Looked beautiful but was not the advertised size. Site said the mat I ordered was 3' by 4', and it was 3' by 46 inches. Two inches makes a difference! I needed the size I ordered, not something "close."
customer_reviews.author: JMT

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy, great if you have dogs
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! This mat is really heavy duty and perfect for handling wet/muddy paws after we bring our dog in. The mat is still soft enough to walk on with bare feet but it's very sturdy. So glad we got this before winter hits! EDIT: We've had this rug for over a year now and it still looks as new as the day we bought it and protects our nice wood floors from the rain and snow that our dog tracks in.
customer_reviews.author: Will/Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Good rug, but unsure of overall Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like these rugs. It seems like it will be easy to clean just because of the way it's constructed. I do know it gets the water off of shoes pretty well. I can't say yet how durable it will be, but the materials seem tough enough to be very durable. Unfortunately, some of the Quality Control is off. The rug that came today has flaws on two of the corners. I'm pretty sure that the surfaces won't separate, but it doesn't look too nice. For that reason I give the overall 2 stars. Were it not for these flaws, I'd give this a solid 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: R Harris

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Everything sticks to it. Can’t vacuum it and can’t shake it out. Have to literally pick everything off by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ink Lash and Brow

customer_reviews.title: Item and description are different
customer_reviews.text: What they sent me looks nothing like the picture. The description does not indicate that this item was curved at the top and the pattern in this mat does not match the one in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: TheDentist

customer_reviews.title: Rubber QC missed the beat
customer_reviews.text: The rubber trim somehow passed through quality control. It looks like I’ve had it for years due to the rubber. A potion was not cut properly. Photos attached. Price is way too high for this oversight.
customer_reviews.author: DaniKamm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mat for catching outdoor dirt
customer_reviews.text: I now have 5 of these mats at my home and office. They are so well made that one of them (like this one) is now 15 years old and as good as the day I first bought it. The color choices are excellent and the color stays exactly as it was when new. They catch most everything at the front door (other than muddy boots tracked by construction clients of mine) and even then the mat catches a lot of it. They may not be cheap but boy do you get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie P. Moses

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mat. We live in the Upper Peninsula of Michigan, where something is always getting tracked in the house: snow, mud, road sand, you name it. This mat handles everything. A big plus is that the dirt sinks down between the ridges, so the top is always clean. And it vacuums clean very easily. The rubber adheres to our hardwood floors, so we don't have to worry about tripping over it, either.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Industrial Entrance Mat
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this mat when it was a "deal of the day", as it looks similar to mats I have researched, but was much less expensive. When I received it, I found it to be much more "industrial" than it appeared- not suitable at all for a home entryway. The dimensionality, which is great for cleaning shoes, is way too deep to look nice in our home. I was going to send it back, but waited a few days too long to look into that.
customer_reviews.author: stampertina

customer_reviews.title: Great Rug
customer_reviews.text: I have been a great supporter of Weather Tech auto mats. I thought I would give the home products for the front door a try. I purchased the inside and outside Weather Tech mats. They didn't take much of anything off our shoes. Wound up with shoe tracks on the hardwood floors. They are more of a boot tray where you leave your shoes. They have been sent back. I purchased a pair of these Water Hogs (inside and outside) and they do a great job of taking off everything on the bottom of your shoes. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: bigfish

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these mats are great. I was a little worried about ordering online without seeing it, but the 3x4 works great inside at my front door. I'm actually purchasing a 2x3 for inside at my glass sliding door.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for Wet & Muddy Paws
customer_reviews.text: I just bought another 5x7 one of these to put inside the French doors that open onto the deck. I often let my big dogs outside and back inside through these doors and they often have dirty feet. These mats look good and come in different colors. I have them at all outside door entries (garage, basement, porch . . . and now from the deck). It's a great mat and big enough to contain the dogs while I wipe their feet. I took a star off for easy-to-clean because you gotta use the vac attachment to get stuff out of the grooves sometimes. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 3Acres

customer_reviews.title: Great rugs!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with these rugs! My kids have a sandbox, and I am tired of shoveling the same out of the house. These rugs not only serve as a reminder for my kids to pull their boots off, but they do a great job of catching the junk inside the thick tread. Simply shaking the rugs does a good job of cleaning, but a quick spray with the pressure washer will undoubtedly get anything sticky. The rugs appear to be well made. They came rolled up and had a slight bend (of course!) but within a minute they had already flattened to the floor. I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Pricey initially but so worth it, and pays for itself quickly
customer_reviews.text: So we're the crazy people with 5 dogs and 2 children. We live in CO. Like any responsible pet owner and clean freak mother, we have hardwood and tile floors through your house which means when it rains or snows you can see muddy foot prints ALL OVER my house. One mat, that I consider too small for the space (my fault) has made such a difference that I quickly order two more (larger sizes) for other high traffic areas in my home. This is an investment that you will quickly appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is wrong in photo
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and was solidly grey, no sign of any tan/camel as shown in photo. The rubber border was also ripped in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Indianam

customer_reviews.title: Mat is smaller than advertised size.
customer_reviews.text: The mat is constructed very good. I am only giving this product 3 stars because of the difference in the stated size compared to the actual size. Stated size is 6' x 4' the actual size is 5' 10" x 3' 9". For $139.95 I expect the mat to be actual size. It did not fully cover the area that I wanted to protect.
customer_reviews.author: Ron, Akron, Ohio

customer_reviews.title: They stay in place!
customer_reviews.text: These really project our hardwood floors! I actually originally bought these because my dog had knee surgery and I wanted her to be able to walk in the house without slipping. These absolutely stay in place and catch a lot of dirt and hair that usually would end up everywhere else in the house. They are not the easiest to vacuum... I usually have to run the vacuum cleaner over it back-and-forth and then diagonally each way to get the dirt out of the grooves. That said in the end I think they have been worth the trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed a waterproof carpet by the door to protect a wood floor and to sit a hall tree on with wet shoes and boots. I also wanted it very durable because I have a cat who scratches at carpets. I also have a small dog who has accidents on carpets so it needed to be easy to clean. This fits all of my needs and I love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Liebes Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not Size as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this mat but the size is not as advertised. I ordered the 4 x 6 mat and it is 4 inches short on both lengths. I ordered the size I ordered to fit a specific spot and it does not fit because the size is not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gibbard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Homes with High-Traffic Entrances
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product if you buy it for the right purpose. This isn't for formal entrances. It's a commercial product. However, it is very practical for home use as an entry carpet in high-traffic areas. It does a great job of trapping dirt or snow when you wipe your shoes or boots on it. Make sure you buy one that is big enough so that people can thoroughly wipe their feet. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Getting Ready for Winter, NICE MAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, mat as described, dimensions are not mine was 34" x 46" which was no big deal to me
customer_reviews.author: MidnightGroove

customer_reviews.title: Mat not like pictured
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine except a bright green logo on the edge of the mat on the front. It was permanently placed on the edge and was very prominent against the dark edge. I contacted the company and was told they did this to get their name out to the public. I don’t mind a logo on my car or a polo shirt, but not on my door mat. Sent it back. A real shame as it was exactly what I wanted without the logo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mats, just a bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a high quality mat for our farmhouse that we were remodeling and these worked perfect. Heavy duty, lay flat, trap mud and water from boots like advertised. They still seem a bit pricey to me but I guess you get what you pay for. We bought 3 of these mats in two different colors, happy with all 3. Definitely recommend if you are looking for a high quality, heavy duty mat for a farm or house in an area that has a lot of traffic with dirty boots or shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Delivered with a manufacturing defect. See the picture. Would not recommend as QA must not be good at this company.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but very worth the price. After trying unsuccessfully to place less expensive rugs in the hall I finally went for this. It was so worth it to get a single, well-constructed rug rather than use several cheaper (though still expensive) rugs. What I paid for several tries of different rugs ended up costing the same as this. Should have started with this rug. It does look and feel like a commercial rug so if you’re into looks more than function this may not be your best choice.
customer_reviews.author: brmsy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mat!  Stays in place and protects my floors- easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: This waterhog mat was exactly what I wanted! I was a little concerned about buying this over the internet without seeing the construction or quality of it, but it turned out great. This is protecting my hardwood floors from the rain, snow, mud, leaf gunk, etc! It's super easy to clean- either vaccuum or wash with a hose. I'll be getting more for the spring when mud season hits.
customer_reviews.author: Jen k

customer_reviews.title: Great Mats but Inconsistent Brand Markings
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is that I purchased two of these, to lay side-by-side, and one of them has "WaterHog" printed on the border in GREEN ink, while the other one DOES NOT. (I wouldn't care if they BOTH said "WaterHog" in green ink, or if NEITHER of them said "WaterHog" in green ink, it just bothers me because they are laying beside each other and they DON'T MATCH.) They appear to be really high quality mats though, so I didn't deduct a star for this, but more consistency in the product line would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: Medicare may pay for this,ask your doctor for a perscription.
customer_reviews.text: Use this rug under my garage to keep dirt etc from tracking in, I ordered the 12× 6 I can blow the dirt off the rug and or wash it of while rug stays in place. Also it presents An older person who may be prone to tripping or slipping a non slip surface. I lost my mother due to a fall order her garage, I do not think it would have happened if she had a rug similar to this.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these rugs for our small family business in place of commercial rugs we had swapped out weekly by our uniform company (just costing too much overall). Was very pleased with these rugs (bought two sizes) and will be purchasing more as needed. They are great heavy duty quality and are holding up very well!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This mat is perfect in entryway and has protected the wood floors from water, leaves, mud, etc. It's nice a heavy so that it doesn't shift around and it's thin enough to fit under the front door. The color is rich and texture is very nice-- looks like it actually belongs in a home. I've gotten quite a few comments on it, already considering getting a few more for other areas of the home.
customer_reviews.author: alauras

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty rug that will not slip!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a larger rug to fit in entry way of apt (purchased the 4'x3' size). I was tired of chintzy, small rugs that kept moving around. This one stays put and looks nice too. And its just built sturdy and is really a quality rug. It can handle a MN winter allowing salt and sediment to slip through grooves and it has room to line up shoes along the sides. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Itsa rug!
customer_reviews.text: The rug was great, but we had to return it because I needed it in a spot where a door had to open over it and it was just too high. Not the rug’s fault, I blame the stupid handmade door on my 200 year old farm house, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Crudo

customer_reviews.title: It's still looking as good as the day I bought it and has been used quite a bit
customer_reviews.text: It has shown itself to be absorbent to moisture at the bottom of the feet or shoes. It doesn't hold water to the extent it smells. And it has deep ruts in it that may help with drying out. What you can't see is it has about a quarter inch deep rut in it. And the only way to get the sand out is you have to take it outside and turn it upside down. But after that it will look as good as the day you bought it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: American made quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made in the U.S., which helps. The rubber backing could probably be a little thicker, which would help it stay in place. It has a little tendency to move, but where i use it, it's on smooth concrete which doesn't help. I think it might be a little on the expensive side, but like I mentioned, it was made in the U.S., which makes it easier to spend a few dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: ebb

customer_reviews.title: Super nice high quality mat!
customer_reviews.text: We originally bought another Mat from a local store which was very thin and only lasted about a year-and-a-half before it started Coral curling up and looking ugly. This mat is undoubtedly one of the best nothing like you would find in a local store, it is high quality thick and commercial grade and stays in place, I would not hesitate to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: David Denver

customer_reviews.title: Slides on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these mats in the 2x3 size. I fine mats has to be shaken off before trying to vacuum them for a good cleaning. I’ve been having a few complaints that these mats slide when stepping on it, potential hazard. They are very good and durable mats but unfortunately I will have to replace them before someone gets hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans dogs feet.
customer_reviews.text: My lab & Malinois drag so much dirt and mud into my sun room I want to scream. Bought one of these mats to see how it worked. Now the mat picks up the dry dirt and absorbs the mud, only thing better would be actually toweling off their feet. The only mistake was not buying two, but that has been corrected. The mat is excellent, sorry I didn't buy some sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I placed the mat on patio floor underneath outside pergola and have two(2) rocking chairs side by side on the mat. It hasn't been rained on yet so I can't rate absorbency, but it looks very nice and allows the rockers to rock more smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug! It’s in our front entryway and has significantly decreased the amount of dirt tracked onto my tile floors. It’s low profile means it lays flat and doesn’t catch on the door and get moved like my old rug. I also like that I can vacuum it with the same attachment I use on my tile floors so I don’t have to carry a heavy rug outside to shake out and beat. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Berklee

customer_reviews.title: Moves too much.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The reason I bought this was that it would not slip on a rug. It does..... It was placed in front of a door to the back yard on the rec room carpet. Will have to move it ; it has become a hazard. We are Seniors.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This May is so solid and well constructed that it is used as an all-purpose mat that not only tracks debris from shors but also loose dirt and pet hair in the air. All I need to do is to vacuum it every once in a while. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy rugs
customer_reviews.text: These are non-slip, sturdy rugs that should hold up for years. They are, however, pricey. I bout the 3x5 and 3x2 in grey. My only complaint is that the 3x5 was stamped on the front edge "waterhog mat". Since I placed these in the basement, I really didn't care about the writing, but if I had this in a different part of the house, I would have returned because who wants writing on their expensive mats??
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: TRUE 5-STAR RATING
customer_reviews.text: Incredible quality, will probably outlast us all. Its construction, materials, pattern, thickness, color, binding and indestructibility combined result in a truly Five Star Product, without any demerits. We are so impressed with this commercial grade product for our retail store in a busy downtown location, we've added 'bring in the mat' to our nightly closing checklist. Very Highly Recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: barusu

customer_reviews.title: Why'd I wait so long!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would've found these sooner. I bought one for the front and back doors. My wife made the comment that the kitchen floor has been easier to clean because the rugs take stuff off of shoes/boots. They really do hold the water as well. I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Pennstater2005

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very heavy duty and well made. I put it out in my garage in front of steps and shoe area. Its height combined with the rubber backing prevents snow melt from my vehicle from getting on the top of the mat, so always dry area to come out to garage and put shoes on, even when the snow/ice melts off my large suv after a blizzard.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, durable, USA made
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kitchen entryway where everyone walks into the house and tracks in whatever is on their shoes or boots. Thick and absorbent but allows door to open. Backing is very durable. This mat replaced an older mat where the plastic sides/backing were cracking and parts were missing. This one looks like it will hold up longer, yet it still looks nice and feels like carpeting. Also it’s made in USA. That was a must for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Forestieri

customer_reviews.title: I did not know that there were little nubs on the bottom...
customer_reviews.text: The carpet grabbing nubs on the bottom are keeping me from using this floor mat. We needed something to keep from ruining our hardwood floor, and I ordered this. Unfortunately it would not be something I would want on my hardwood...the hard little nubs are probably great for keeping it in place on carpet, and help with drying on tile, but they will damage softer flooring. Going to put it at the back door, so I won't return, but just be aware. It is definitely a durable water catching entry mat though!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat and stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavyweight outdoor mat. It's flat and doesn't move or slide in wet weather. Does a good job cleaning crud off shoe bottoms. The mat traps wetness but doesn't dry shoes so you still get wet feet tracks. Needed a different second mat inside to take care of that.
customer_reviews.author: chris p

customer_reviews.title: Needed a mat to cover a 4'x6' layer of 4" ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a mat to cover a 4'x6' layer of 4" solid pavers to reduce the step height to a rear door into the carport. This mat has sufficient body and weight to provide a solid stable surface and greatly reduce the tracked in outside dirt. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sr Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Nice-looking door mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat looks nice at my doors. The texture works well to wipe shoes. My only complaint is that it holds water when it rains. They should consider modifying how it’s made so that it drains quicker.
customer_reviews.author: KitV

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. Had one for several years and then we had a flood at our property so I had to get rid of it. I wouldn’t want anything but this. The best mat ever. Grabs the dirt and water from rain and snow. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great rug for a business
customer_reviews.text: This rug is really low profile. We have had problems with the door rubbing and rolling up lesser quality carpets. This rug is sewed under the rubber so it lays flat. My employees think I'm awesome for buying it. Yay.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty for residential use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in anticipation of our next snowy season two years ago and it has hardly snowed since, so I cannot attest to the "water hog" function that it was intended for. But it picks up a lot of dirt, which you can beat out fairly easily (although it is not lightweight).
customer_reviews.author: conrad

customer_reviews.title: Seems indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: I think I finally found a floor mat that my cats can't destroy! I'll know in a couple more months for sure but so far (6 months) it has held up well! They completely wrecked a similar mat from LL Bean within a year.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Tan

customer_reviews.title: Great for in front of the sink (if you wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Very tough, durable, cleanable and industrial quality .. but harsh on the bare feet. Great for in front of the sink (if you wear shoes)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a rug should
customer_reviews.text: This thing is thick and sturdy, eats dirt off the soles of shoes. Use a power washer on it every few days and it still looks new. And because it's heavy, it doesn't curl up at the corners and trip everybody like those crappy thin rugs Home Depot sells.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. E.

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Used the mat to replace a throw-rug where a corner occasionally folded over and tripped someone. This new mat is much sturdier and safer.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality,right size
customer_reviews.text: Great quality,looks good. Traps dirt and snow. Tall pile cleans shoe bottoms. Pile seems like its going to hold up well.Feels "springy" under foot. I bought the 3'x5' so i could remain on the mat when I shut the door. Border has a nice gradual taper that makes it almost impossible to catch the edge or trip on. Stays put. Hoping to get many years out of this mat and so far 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Had for a couple months now with dirt snow and rain can’t even tell it’s dirty ... absorbs everything and doesn’t smell bad just vacuum regular cuz it wipes shoes clean very well
customer_reviews.author: andre mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking, Durable, and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this doormat. It's durable, easy to clean, and by far, the most attractive doormat that I have seen. When I bought it, I thought it was expensive, but it's worthy every penny spent. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Zimowski

customer_reviews.title: Large Heavy Duty Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Came with a flaw but it was replaced in two days. Next one was great. Heavy duty and good color. Can’t say enough about what a nice door mat this is. Keeps all the water, leaves, grass etc off the wood floor and looks nice doing it,
customer_reviews.author: Westieheaven

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: The groves on this mat are so deep and the material quite stiff so it is almost impossible to mat with a vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: GREAT  FLOOR MAT
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER LEAVE REVIEWS, BUT IN THIS CASE I REALLY WANTED TO. THIS IS A GREAT FLOOR MAT, WHEN I PLACED IT ON TOP OF MY CARPET IT DOES NOT MOVE AROUND LIKE SOME OF THE CHEAP RUGS I HAVE BROUGHT IN THE PAST. VERY THICK AND HEAVY AND HAVE MANY SUCTIONS THAT STICK TO THE FLOOR. YOU WILL LOVE THIS FLOOR MAT AND WILL NOT REGRET THIS BUY. DH
customer_reviews.author: DANI

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Stays in place, vibrant blue color
customer_reviews.text: Nice vibrant blue for the 2 double door entry way to my busy beach store business. Had a month and so far no fraying and easy clean up. Actually a bit high pile to run our vacuum so we just take it outside and shake it off daily. Heavy enough so it doesn't move on ceramic tile with the heavy traffic of my shop. We purchased two of the 5 foot rugs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this product. Excellent, exactly as described. It laid flat right out of the box, gripped my carpet well, is waterproof, and was easy to vacuum. Would definitely purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Natural21

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it these (I have ordered multiple)
customer_reviews.text: Very, very happy with it these (I have ordered multiple). I placed them in the 3 season room and they really help us keep the dirt outside the house especially with a large dog. I am giving them 4 starts because of size inconsistency. I ordered two of the same size and the length difference was at least 3 inches.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug. It’s a dark space black and it’s heavy so it lays flat without curling up. Also, it was one of the only ones to come in the huge size I reuested
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Christian

customer_reviews.title: What a doormat
customer_reviews.text: One star removed for apologizing too much and generally letting people walk all over it. Come on, stand up for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: wronghonk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mat
customer_reviews.text: Mine is now a year old and it still looks like the day arrived. It does the job as advertised and looks great doing it. Stays put and flat on the floor. In this case you are getting what you are paying for. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Measurements Aren't Exact
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bummed that the 2' x 3' is actually smaller than 2' x 3'. But don't want to hassle with finding another, so we're keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Banana

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a good sale price, too. Have been very happy with it! Still looks new after months.
customer_reviews.author: Ninsuna

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to my 4 dogs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this rug for my dog's food and watering area and its worked great. Its worked so well that I went back and ordered a larger one for the entrance to my living room. Considering I got 4 dogs and it holds up so well I am sure anyone would be happy with this rug.
customer_reviews.author: Keif

customer_reviews.title: Well made, look better than most.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had it long to know its durability, but based upon similar mats I’ve purchased, it should be durable. These are nice, reasonably attractive mats.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Cravagan

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two more!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Waterhog mat for my office as a replacement for one that was curling at the edges and posed a trip hazard. When it arrived, I was so impressed with the quality, I ordered two for my home. The textured back prevents slipping when placed on carpet and the thick beveled banding along the edges prevents curling. So far, they have only needed a weekly vacuuming to clean. A Waterhog mat will be the house present this year for our daughter's home
customer_reviews.author: RZee

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: “Commercial grade” is accurate. What you’d find at a business. But works and looks good in front of our house. It lasts and holds up in the weather.
customer_reviews.author: YummyLemonjello

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty, Commercial Quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect under our trash cans at our skating rink. Helps a lot with the mess.
customer_reviews.author: rollercityjax

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great, durable and love the color selection! The only hiccup I’d have is that the cleaning it is going to rake some time... With all that, it’s a great quality- I’d definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rug....perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted as a gift for my daughter. Nice black color. Nice size.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Worth the premium
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a garage runner before walking into the house. Yeah it's expensive but I'm betting it will last a decade or more for my uses. Thick and appears well made. Used this for almost a year now. A quick vacuuming every 2-3 months and it's good to go. Once or twice a year you can hose it down for a good cleaning. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Edge

customer_reviews.title: SUPER NICE MAT!!!!  I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER NICE MAT!!!! I LOVE IT!! The mat has a classy look, quality feel to it, good weight so it doesn't slide around and is very absorbent. This is NOT an outdoor mat to be directly exposed to the elements. For best use I would recommend this mat to be used where there is overhead covering such as a screened in porch.
customer_reviews.author: H20girl

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my floors clean
customer_reviews.text: This rug is absolutely beautiful, and very sturdy. It’s at my front door greeting everybody who comes with a sign that says wipe your feet. Every bit worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie b

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent rug. Bought for mud room - works as advertised and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Stone

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a heavy duty, sturdy mat for an entryway, but the one I purchased has two defects where the fabric is missing. Definitely not worth over $70. I will be returning and purchasing elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and practical
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking durable rug for salty, wet boots. I bought the 3x4 in gray for my foyer to save my hardwood floors from salty, damp boots. Sharp looking rug for commercial grade. Highly recommend. Worth thr$$.
customer_reviews.author: amazongitit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. Absorb a lot of message and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Kieran P. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: These rugs are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, exactly as described. Durable and they do a great job of holding in snow and water...!
customer_reviews.author: BK - Walled Lake, MI

customer_reviews.title: Love this matt
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect matt for indoor or outdoors good quality and it does not get dirty easily
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Very solid, although I'm using it a bit oddly.
customer_reviews.text: Wow is this thing heavy. I use it as the base for an almost platform under-chair mat for my desk. On top of this I have a 1/8th inch thick polycarbonate panel. The two together make for a brilliantly good chair mat.
customer_reviews.author: MLT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We have very low doors but this rug it’s heavyweight and very grippy that it doesn’t move when the door opens and closes!!
customer_reviews.author: Madilyn

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We have used this all winter. I loved it. Saved me so much time and trouble.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this mat
customer_reviews.text: We live in the North Woods, so I am constantly battling pine needles and tracked in dirt. I have a dog and young boy to boot! The mat stays put, I can open and shut my front door over it. It really has helped cut down on tracked in much. I simply vacuum it thoroughly a few times a week. It has kept it's shape and color. For a deeper clean, I take it outside and wash it with a mild dish detergent and a hose.
customer_reviews.author: Lila Waltrip

customer_reviews.title: good quality but black confuses the robot
customer_reviews.text: robot won't clean black, confuses a cliff. maybe brown works?
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our entry way in trapping dirt from our shoes, lies flat and does not slip. Very functional. Not the most attractive in terms of decor but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and durable floor mat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mat for the entrance from our garage to laundry room. We wanted a large size to fit the space. This one was perfect and also looks wonderful it is very durable. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty mat. Great color.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the sole purpose of collecting most of the water from my patio fountain that splashes, only to cause calcium on the stones. This mat is thick and well made plus the color matches the fountain well. Just hope over time it does not mildew.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean with vacuum. traps dirty and water.
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty. easy to clean with vacuum. I use in my electronic retail store.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: WaterHog Mat soaks up water!
customer_reviews.text: Used this product by the back door where we go in and out frequently -- really soaks up water and snow -- keeps my hard wood floor dry and streak free. Really love and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Callie J. Bagdon

customer_reviews.title: Great for my long mud room
customer_reviews.text: So far this rug is exactly what I wanted for our mud room space. Haven’t had much rain or snow yet to test it that out. Arrived as pictured. Nicely rolled and laid flat apon opening. Low profile but still nice and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: snofam4

product_meta.title: WaterHog Eco Commercial-Grade Entrance Mat, Indoor/Outdoor Black Smoke Floor Mat 3' Length x 2' Width, Black Smoke by M+A Matting - 2295700023
product_meta.description: Size:"3' Length x 2' Width"| Color:Black SmokeWaterHog Eco Premier mats are durable, stain-resistant mats with a unique bi-level design that traps dirt and moisture below shoe level, keeping your floors clean, dry, and safe. WaterHog Eco Premier mats feature an attractive diamond patterned surface that’s both beautiful and . The fabric is made with a durable solution-dyed fiber that dissipates water for quick drying and will not fade or rot. The fiber is polyethylene terephthalate, commonly referred to as PET. PET is made with 100% post-consumer recycled plastic from drink bottles. When you purchase a product made with 100% PET, you’re helping keep dozens of plastic bottles out of our oceans and landfills! And WaterHog mats are backed with SBR rubber which contains 20% post-consumer recycled rubber from car tires. The rubber will not crack or curl, ensuring your mat will lie flat and remain in place. If you’re looking for a beautiful, mat that will provide years of reliable performance, look no further than WaterHog Eco. Manufactured by M+A Matting in the USA, WaterHog mats are THE ORIGINAL bi-level mats. The extreme popularity has led to countless “copycat” products. WaterHog is often imitated, but it is never replicated. M+A uses the highest quality raw materials (and in the case of WaterHog Eco, sustainable materials) and meticulous design standards to manufacture commercial grade mats made to perform for years. If you want a quality mat that will keep your floors clean and dry, make sure you purchase a genuine WaterHog.
feature_bullets: STOPS DIRT AT THE DOOR | Bi-level surface effectively scrapes dirt and moisture from shoes, trapping it beneath shoe level to prevent tracking; water dam border holds up to 1. 5 gallons of water per square yard, keeping your floors clean, dry, and safe
ECO-FRIENDLY | PET fabric is made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic from drink bottles; SBR rubber backing contains 20% recycled rubber from car tires
DURABLE, FADE solution-dyed PET fabric is resistant to staining, dries quickly, and will not fade or rot
SAFE | Beveled edges provide a safe transition from floor to mat; certified high-traction by the National Floor Safety Institute (NFSI)

MADE IN USA | (2x3, 24x35); Please note, mat sizes are approximate as rubber shrinks and expands in conjunction with temperature and time. Tolerable manufacturing size variance is 3-5%. WaterHog Eco mats are Prop 65 compliant.
